blog.name: ai-memoria
blog.title: Ai Memoria
blog.description:
She | Her | 22 
 Vietnamese | English
 Crappy Writer | Poet
 Indie | Macabre | Artistic horror enthusiast

title: No.2
body:
I have this little habit of secretly checking random people who reacted ( favourite, reblog, comment, repost, etc… ) to my work or follow me on social media. It’s a nice way to check out other people’s pages and sometimes, I would find inspiration on their pages ( and some other times, I run into porn hubs which I just hit the block button whenever I see one ). But anyway, in another night when I was spontaneously checking others’ pages, I saw a few recent artworks of the owner of a page and they oddly resembled my style. I just quickly check when they were posted and realized that it was around the time when he/she started following me, and I believe that this thing happens to every artist out there in the world, who are trying their best to improve themselves to give you all the unique arts with styles that define them. An art style is not something which could be made within a day. It’s a process of creating, innovating and finding ways to express artists’ feelings through their works. So if you just go ahead and “try” their styles without crediting them, it’s no different from stealing their identities. I know that many artists out there don’t mind if you want to try to draw in their styles or make them fanarts because their arts are so cool, and all it takes are just a proper credit and a tag to let them know how their arts inspire you. So please, don’t go and make something belongs to someone else your own. For artists, their styles are what make them who they are, and they are their invaluable treasures. Just think about it. If someone took your treasure away, how would you feel by then?

DeviantArt | Instagram | Facebook

But anyway, in another night when I was spontaneously checking others’ pages, I saw a few recent artworks of the owner of a page and they oddly resembled my style. blog.description:
PORTFOLIO | PATREON | SENIOR THESIS '15 | INKTOBER '15

Official tumblr art blog of Sizab aka Maxwell Delzer.
Sizab is an autistic and non-binary artist born and raised in Riverside, California who makes illustrations and character drawings. In May 2016 they earned their Bachelor of Arts with a minor in LGBT Studies from the University of California Berkeley.


[CONTACT: maxwell.delzer@gmail.com]
Commissions: OPEN

summary:
Cuando tenes a un amigo al cual no tuviste que poseer, ni manipular o ofrecer un contrato de sangre para ser su mejor amiga.

 ...
caption:
Cuando tenes a un amigo al cual no tuviste que poseer, ni manipular o ofrecer un contrato de sangre para ser su mejor amiga.

◈◈◈◈◈◈

When you got a friend to which you didn’t have to possess, nor manipulate or to offer a blood contract to be his best friend.
